author: Joshua Fluke

Job hopping: the unforgivable sin according to CEOs who probably switched companies five times before lunch. In this video, we tear apart the myth that staying at one job forever is a sign of grit, loyalty, or whatever buzzword makes the execs sleep at night. Spoiler alert: job hopping isn’t a red flag—it’s your ticket to better
title: THE JOB HOPPING "EPIDEMIC"
